item.title: Zucchini Gnocchi
item.description: Ingredients 400 g gnocchi 2 tsp. oil 1 zucchini 3 large tomatoes (about 300 g) 1 onion 1 clove garlic 100 g feta 2 tsp. oregano 1 tsp. parsley 1tsp. thyme 1 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. pepper Directions Chop the onions and the garlic finely. Cut the tomatoes and zucchini into about 2 cm cubes. Heat oil in a large pan. Fry the gnocchi in the pan briefly.
